turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning. Can you take down a Starbucks order for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what will you have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For myself I need a berry yogurt, a chocolate croissant warmed up, and a triple shot espresso

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, berry yogurt, chocolate croissant warmed up and a triple shot espresso. What’s next?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also need a venti mocha non fat frappecino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a venti non fat mocha frappecino. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also need a cheddar bacon sandwich, a tall iced coffee, and a banana

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, cheddar bacon sandwich, a tall iced coffee, and a banana. Who’s next?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The last thing is a passion fruit iced tea, venti, with no sweetener

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, venti passion fruit iced tea with no sweetener.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I make that tall iced coffee a grande instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A grande iced coffee instead of a tall, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That’s everything. Can you pick it up from the Starbucks over on Olympic and Main?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks on Olympic and Main, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually hold on, we might have one more order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, can you add two bottles of Ethos water to the entire order? That’ll do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two bottles of Ethos water, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No worries.
